title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 613.4 - Membership of oversight committee
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 613.4 - Membership of oversight committee

State Regulations

The membership of the oversight
committee shall consist of lawyers to be nominated by the presidents of the bar
associations and by the justices of the Appellate Division, First Department. The chair and vice-chair shall be designated by the presiding justice from
among the nominees. The term of appointment for each member shall be for a
period of three years subject to renomination by the justices of the Appellate

Division, with the exception that four nominees will be appointed for an
initial term of four years. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
613.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
